Well, without the message board up yet, its kinda unfair not to allow 
OOC posts, but can you guys please keep it down just a tad? It gets 
kinda annoying having to read post after post of OOC.

I'm making a message board as a project for my comp class, though, so 
hopefully one will be up soon!


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
> hey you bunch of Winers, youre not allowed to fill the board with 
crap posts 
> like this. stop it.
> -council member jp
